Name: Memory Train
About the game: Train your memory in this puzzle game. Several numbers appear in front of you, which you need to remember and press in the same sequence. For each successful chain of numbers, you get points. As you progress, the numbers that appear will have more complex strings. Put your memory to the test. Enjoy your game.
